issue.title: [Rust] Add missing method docs for Arrays
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10326](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10326). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Whenever a PR comes we don't inspect documentation thus some of the methods are missing documentations about what they do. We should regularly check and carefully inspect the explanations if they are adequate or not. This issue is for filling in all missing doc comments.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10326?focusedCommentId=17332137) by Andrew Lamb (alamb):*
Migrated to github: https://github.com/apache/arrow-rs/issues/112
